titles.title: Landing Pass Extension Act of 2014
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend the period of time for which a conditional permit to land temporarily may be granted to an alien crewman.
Landing Pass Extension Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary: Landing Pass Extension Act of 2014 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend to up to 90 days the time period for which a conditional permit to land temporarily in the United States may be granted to an alien crewman.
